pages.about: About Us | ElitePlay Equipment | Our Story & Team ElitePlay Equipmet Main About Us Products 👤 About Us Discover the story behind ElitePlay Equipment, your premier choice for high-quality casino equipment rentals in Canada. Our Story ElitePlay Equipment was founded with a vision to revolutionize the casino equipment rental industry. From our humble beginnings to becoming a leading provider, our journey has been driven by a commitment to excellence. It all started with a small team of enthusiasts who saw a gap in the market for high-quality, reliable casino equipment rentals. Our dedication to customer satisfaction and quality service quickly set us apart. Over the years, we have grown and expanded our offerings, continuously innovating and improving our services to meet the evolving needs of our clients. Today, we are proud to be recognized as a trusted partner for event planners and hosts across Canada, delivering exceptional casino equipment for a wide range of events. Our Mission Our mission is to provide top-tier casino equipment that enhances the event experience, ensuring our clients and their guests have an unforgettable time. We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from the quality of our equipment to our customer support. At ElitePlay Equipment, we value integrity, reliability, and innovation. We are committed to upholding these values in all our interactions and services, building lasting relationships with our clients based on trust and excellence. Our Values ✔ Integrity ✔ Reliability ✔ Innovation ✔ Customer Focus ✔ Quality Meet Our Team John Smith Co-Founder & CEO John brings over 20 years of experience in the event management industry, leading ElitePlay Equipment with a vision for excellence and innovation. Emily Johnson Co-Founder & COO Emily oversees the operational aspects of the company, ensuring smooth and efficient service delivery for all our clients. Michael Brown Head of Product Development Michael is responsible for the continuous innovation and enhancement of our product offerings, bringing the latest trends in casino equipment to our inventory. Jessica Williams Marketing Director Jessica leads our marketing efforts, crafting strategies that drive brand awareness and engagement. David Miller Customer Support Lead David ensures that our clients receive top-notch support and service, addressing any queries and concerns promptly. Sarah Wilson Logistics Manager Sarah coordinates the logistics and delivery of our equipment, ensuring timely and efficient service for every event. Our Projects Experience We have been privileged to provide our premium casino equipment for a variety of events. Here are some of our most successful projects: Corporate Event An elegant corporate event with a sophisticated casino setup, featuring poker and blackjack tables. Charity Gala A luxurious charity gala with guests in evening attire, enjoying roulette and craps games. Private Party A cozy private party with friends enjoying high-quality casino games like poker and blackjack. Wedding An elegant wedding reception featuring premium casino equipment, with guests enjoying roulette and poker games. Get in Touch Have questions or ready to book? Reach out to us and we’ll assist you promptly. Contact Us Frequently Asked Questions What types of casino equipment do you offer? We offer a wide range of casino equipment including poker tables, roulette wheels, blackjack tables, and more. How do I make a reservation? To make a reservation, simply contact us via our website form, email, or phone. We'll guide you through the process and ensure all your needs are met. Do you provide delivery and setup services? Yes, we offer comprehensive delivery and setup services to ensure your event runs smoothly. What are your rental rates? Our rental rates vary depending on the equipment and duration of the rental. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your event. Can I customize the equipment setup for my event? Absolutely. We work closely with you to customize the setup to fit your event's theme and requirements. ElitePlay Equipmet About Us Products eliteplay@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site. By continuing to use our site, you agree to our use of cookies. Accept

pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | ElitePlay Equipment | Data Protection ElitePlay Equipmet Main About Us Products Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to our Privacy Policy page. At ElitePlay Equipment, we are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that are collected and recorded by us and how we use it. 2. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, participate in activities on the website, or otherwise when you contact us. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other details you choose to provide. 3. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support 4. Sharing Your Information We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as necessary to provide you with our services or as required by law. We may share information with vendors, consultants, and other service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf. 5. Data Security We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse. 6. Retention of Data We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. 7. Your Data Protection Rights Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete. The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our website and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service. 9. Children's Privacy Our services do not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 18. In the case we discover that a child under 18 has provided us with personal information, we immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we will be able to take necessary actions. 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at eliteplay@gmail.com. ElitePlay Equipmet About Us Products eliteplay@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site. By continuing to use our site, you agree to our use of cookies. Accept

Equipment Catalog Poker Table Professional-grade poker tables with padded armrests, cup holders, and a felt surface for smooth card dealing. Size: 8ft x 4ft Material: Wood, felt, padding Features: Cup holders, padded armrests Blackjack Table Sturdy and elegant blackjack tables designed for an authentic casino experience, complete with chip trays and dealer space. Size: 7ft x 3ft Material: Wood, felt Features: Chip trays, dealer space Roulette Wheel High-quality, balanced roulette wheels for a fair and exciting gaming experience, available in various sizes. Size: 32 inches diameter Material: Wood, metal Features: Smooth spin, durable build Craps Table Full-sized craps tables with padded rails and high-quality felt, providing an authentic and thrilling craps game experience. Size: 12ft x 4ft Material: Wood, felt, padding Features: Padded rails, detailed layout Slot Machine Authentic slot machines featuring modern and classic game options, complete with lighting and sound effects. Size: 6ft x 2ft Material: Metal, plastic Features: Lighting, sound effects Card Shuffler Efficient and reliable card shufflers to ensure fair play and save time during your event. Contact us today to learn more and make a reservation. Contact Us Our Principles ✓ Customer Satisfaction ✓ Integrity ✓ Quality ✓ Innovation ✓ Responsibility Rental and Return Terms We aim to make your experience with us seamless and transparent. Here are our rental and return terms: All equipment must be reserved at least 48 hours in advance. A security deposit is required for all rentals and will be refunded upon return of the equipment in good condition. Equipment must be returned on the agreed date. Late returns may incur additional charges. Clients are responsible for any damages or losses during the rental period. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the event will forfeit the security deposit. Please review our full rental terms and conditions for detailed information. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | ElitePlay Equipment | Usage Rules ElitePlay Equipmet Main About Us Products Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Welcome to ElitePlay Equipment. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use ElitePlay Equipment if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. 2. Definitions The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement, and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You", and "Your" refers to you, the person who logs on this website and is compliant with the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our", and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. 3. Cookies We employ the use of cookies. By accessing ElitePlay Equipment, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with our Privacy Policy. Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. 4. License Unless otherwise stated, ElitePlay Equipment and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on this website. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from ElitePlay Equipment for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions. 5. User Comments Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. ElitePlay Equipment does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of ElitePlay Equipment, its agents, and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who posts their views and opinions. 6. Payment Terms All payments must be made in full at the time of booking unless otherwise agreed upon. We accept various forms of payment including credit/debit cards, and bank transfers. Any payment discrepancies must be reported within 30 days of the transaction date. Failure to make timely payments may result in service suspension or cancellation. 7. Reservation of Rights We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our website. You agree to immediately remove all links to our website upon request. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions and its linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions. 8. Removal of Links from Our Website If you find any link on our website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us at any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or to respond to you directly. 9. Content Liability We shall not be held responsible for any content that appears on your website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that arise on your website. No link(s) should appear on any website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights. 10. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms and conditions will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that jurisdiction. 11. Amendments We may revise these terms and conditions from time to time. Revised terms and conditions will apply to the use of our website from the date of the publication of the revised terms on the website. Please check this page regularly to ensure you are happy with any changes. 12.
